description:
This game is not only fun but highly performant, being able to run on just about every single system that I have tried it on. It will run on an absolute toaster. 

In Kubuntu 18.04 there was a slight issue which prevented it from running in full-screen mode but this seems to have been an issue with KDE that has been solved for Kubuntu 20.04.

I have had zero problems with this game in Kubuntu 20.04.

1. there has since been a new version of AC released, yet the Ubuntu Software download has not been updated to reflect this. Please update this!

2. since the beginning, this game has inadvertently favored Windows users by granting them an advantage over those running the game in either GNU/Linux or macOS: the grenade-throw animation in Windows is noticeably faster than it is in the other two major operating systems; this gives those playing in Windows an Edge, because they're able to cook and/or throw grenades much faster than those others are able to do so. AC team -- if you're reading this, please fix the issue once and for all!
summary: I have loved this game for years... but I currently have two gripes

Lo jugaba hace como 8 años en la laptop de mi familia, ahora tengo 19 años y me hace mucha ilusión jugarlo, me recuerda mucho a mi infancia. Era muy videojuego favorito.

Este juego es increíble para jugar con tus amigos a un shooter ligero, el juego funciona en computadoras muy malas, ya que es muy ligero, tiene multijugador en línea, y todavía hay jugadores, generalmente hay 2 servidores funcionales, uno casi lleno (como 16 personas) y el otro con 4 personas, los otros servidores tienden a estar vacio, si no tienes internet puedes jugar con bots.
summary: Juego ligero, divertido para jugar con amigos
